    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The need for food - growth</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Notwendigkeit an der Nahrung - Wachstum</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le besoin de nourriture - croissance</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A necessidade para o alimento - crescimento</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'esigenza di alimento - sviluppo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η ανάγκη για τα τρόφιμα - αύξηση</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La necesidad del alimento - crecimiento</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">First of three illustrations why people need food. Shown here is a boy and a grown up which tells that food is needed for growth.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">food</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">growth</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Health</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">nutrition</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">survival</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zuerst von drei Abbildungen, warum Leute Nahrung 
benötigen. Hier gezeigt ein Junge und aufgewachsen worden 
welches erklärt, dieser Nahrung ist für Wachstum erforderlich.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">D'abord de trois illustrations pourquoi les gens 
ont besoin de nourriture. Montré ici est un garçon et grandi 
ce qui indique cette nourriture est nécessaire pour la croissance.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Primeiramente de três ilustrações porque os 
povos necessitam o alimento. É mostrado aqui um menino e 
crescido acima qual diz esse alimento é needed para o crescimento.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In primo luogo di tre illustrazioni perchè la 
gente ha bisogno dell'alimento. È indicato qui un ragazzo e 
sviluppato in su quale dice a quell'alimento è necessario per 
sviluppo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πρώτα τριών απεικονίσεων γιατί οι άνθρωποι 
χρειάζονται τα τρόφιμα. Εμφανισμένο εδώ είναι ένα αγόρι 
και μεγαλωμένη που λέει ότι τα τρόφιμα απαιτούνται για την 
αύξηση.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Primero de tres ilustraciones porqué la gente 
necesita el alimento. Aquí muestran un muchacho y crecido para 
arriba cuál dice ese alimento es necesario para el crecimiento.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Nahrung</string>
          </keyword>
